title: Hogwarts Legacy Lead Designer Quits - Kinda Funny Games Daily 03.05.21
description:
Visit http://joinhoney.com/GAMES to get Honey for FREE.

For a limited time, visit http://logitechg.com and use code KindaFunnyDailyFreeShip31 for free express shipping, but hurry — this promo code expires in 5 days!

Blessing is joined by Gamespot's Michael Higham to talk about Hogwarts Legacy losing its lead designer, Artifact support coming to an end, and more.

Follow Michael: https://twitter.com/michaelphigham

We revealed the new MCU In Review intro yesterday: https://twitter.com/KindaFunnyVids/status/1367892752420147200 
In case you missed it: There’s a brand new episode of The Blessing Show up right now where I break down “What makes a good puzzle game”. I interviewed the dev behind one of my favorite puzzle games “Manifold Garden” and it has some of Roger’s best editing work to date. You can catch that on Youtube.com/KindaFunnyGames right now.
